title: MAFS' Elizabeth Sobinoff shows off her 10kg weight loss
text:
Married At First Sight's Elizabeth Sobinoff has overhauled her entire look in recent months, and shed an impressive 10kg in the process.

And the jewellery store manager drew attention to her new look in a photo shared to Instagram on Tuesday.

The 27-year-old sported a silk slip dress and white headband and promoted two beauty companies in the promotional post.

My, how you've changed! MAFS' Elizabeth Sobinoff, 27, showed off her 10 kilogram weight loss in a grey silk slip dress in a photo shared to Instagram on Tuesday

In the snap, Elizabeth held onto a skincare product in one hand, with her brunette locks tied in a topknot.

The reality star showed off her blemish-free skin and added a slick of clear lip gloss.

Promoting two companies, Elizabeth wrote in the caption: 'My daily routine with my absolute favourite @tribeskincare. I love how these products are all natural, vegan and cruelty-free.

Moving on! Since appearing on Married At First Sight earlier this year, Elizabeth has completely transformed her appearance. Pictured on her wedding day

'And better yet to keep my skincare lasting longer and prevent bacteria growth, I store them in @thebeautyfridge, the cutest mini fridge ever.'

Since appearing on Married At First Sight earlier this year, Elizabeth has completely transformed her appearance.

She has ditched her blonde hair extensions and embraced a more natural brunette shade, toned down her makeup, and shed an impressive 10kg.

Transformation: Elizabeth has shed an impressive 10kg (right) in recent months

'I love my body... at any size,' she recently told NW magazine.

'I've thought that when I weighed 49kg and when I've weighed 90kg. I want women to realise that we're all so much more than a number on a scale,' she added.

'So, yes, I've lost some weight since I was a "huge" size 10 when I was on MAFS, but that doesn't mean I'm any "better" now, just because I'm slimmer.'

Elizabeth was paired with Sam Ball on MAFS. On their wedding day, the tradesman infamously 'fat shamed' his bride by saying he didn't 'usually date girls her size'.
description: Married At First Sight's Elizabeth Sobinoff, 27, highlighted her slender figure in a grey silk slip dress.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
